extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • GetID

        public java.lang.String GetID()
        Returns:
        the string ID, ie "1234"

      • GetNeighborID

        public java.lang.String GetNeighborID(int direction)
        see docs for static version

      • GetNeighborID

        public static java.lang.String GetNeighborID(java.lang.String HexID,
                             int direction)
        Returns a neighbor ID given a direction no OOB or null checking is performed
        Parameters:
        HexID - The Hex to find the neighbor of
        direction - The direction, 0 = NE, 1 = N, 2 = NW, ... 5 = SE
        Returns:
        The ID of the neighbor, whether or not the neighbor actually exists

      • GetCoords

        public int[] GetCoords()
        Returns:
        A pair of coordinates for the given hex, IE returns {1,23} for hex "0123"

      • GetIntID

        public int GetIntID()
        Returns:
        the integer ID of the hex, IE returns 123 for hex "0123"
